title: Looking for committed subs to join the established team and organization HNP
body:
Looking for willing, committed, mature players who will dedicate themselves to integrating themselves into a team environment and learning and performing to the best of their ability.  As a substitute player you will be training with us on a weekly basis and will be a key part of the roster.  No specific role is required or needed, but champion and role diversity is necessary. 

IGN: Chert

replies.body: Hey, I am a Supp main and would be interested in subbing for your team, currently p3. Hmu if interested
